#     stat = <STAT>, 
#     position = <POSITION>
#   ) +
#   <COORDINATE_FUNCTION> +
#   <FACET_FUNCTION>

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  # <GEOM_FUNCTION>()
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
  # <COORDINATE_FUNCTON> + <FACET_FUNCTION>
  coord_flip() + facet_wrap(~class, ncol = 2)
```
